label.description:
The label text that screen readers will read when this component gets
focus.

language.description: The language to use (adds autocomplete and syntax highlighting).

readOnly.description:
This disables editing of the editor content by the user and API calls.

__Note:__ The editor is still focusable in readOnly mode. Read more at the [codemirror documentation](https://codemirror.net/6/docs/ref/#state.EditorState%5EreadOnly).

editable.description:
Controls whether the editor content DOM is editable.

__Note:__ When set to false, the editor is not focusable.
(This doesn't affect API calls that change the editor content, e.g.: copy-paste,
even when those are bound to keys or buttons.) Read more at the [codemirror documentation](https://codemirror.net/6/docs/ref/#view.EditorView%5Eeditable).

lineNumbers.description: Whether to display the line numbers in the gutter

foldGutter.description: Whether to show a fold status indicator before foldable lines (which can be clicked to fold or unfold the line)

highlightActiveLineGutter.description: Whether to highlight gutter elements on the active line (visible only when a gutter is visible)

highlightActiveLine.description: Highlights the lines that have a cursor on them

lineWrapping.description: Whether it should scroll or wrap for long lines. Defaults to false (scroll)

autofocus.description: Whether the editor should focus itself on initialization

spellcheck.description: Whether spellcheck will be enabled on the input

indentOnLoad.description:
Whether the editor should auto-indent the code on this initial load
and when the `value` is changed

indentWithTab.description:
When this feature is on, Tab and Shift-Tab will indent the code. By default, it is turned off, and tabbing will focus the next element in the tab order.

__Note__: Even if this feature is on, pressing Escape before tabbing will not handle indentation and will handle focus instead.

indentUnit.description:
Overrides the unit by which indentation happens (defaults to 2 spaces).
Should be a string consisting either entirely of spaces or entirely of tabs.

direction.description: Flips overall layout and selects base paragraph direction to be "LTR" or "RTL".

rtlMoveVisually.description:
Whether horizontal cursor movement through "RTL" text is visual
(pressing the left arrow moves the cursor left) or logical
(pressing the left arrow moves to the next lower index in the string,
which is visually right in "RTL" text)

defaultValue.description: The default value of the editor (in uncontrolled mode)

value.description:
The selected value for the controlled version
(needs an onChange handler to work)

onChange.description: Called when the value of the component changes.

onFocus.description: Called when the editor receives focus

onBlur.description: Called when the editor loses focus

attachment.description: Sets minor visual styles (border radius & top/bottom margin)

elementRef.description: provides a reference to the underlying html root element

containerRef.description: provides a reference to the html element of the editor's container

tsType.name: signature

searchConfig.description: enable search panel in editor when pressing ctrl/cmd+f

title: SourceCodeEditor
